meanings.sent1: The artist used the color puce to paint the beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was a lovely shade of puce, perfect for the autumn season.
meanings.sent3: The puce walls in the room made it feel cozy and warm.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in hues of puce, creating a magical evening.
meanings.sent5: The puce ribbon on the gift added a touch of elegance.

meanings.sent1: My dog scratched himself constantly due to the pesky puce infestation.
meanings.sent2: After camping in the woods, we discovered our tent was full of puce.
meanings.sent3: The puce in the house seemed to have a party on their own, jumping around.
meanings.sent4: The puce on the stray cat seemed to have a whole community living on it.
meanings.sent5: The puce on the carpet seemed to have a life of its own, hopping around.
